ComicInfo.Summary:
The fiery conclusion as Sonjaâ€™s Death hangs in the balance! Red Sonja caretaker Luke Lieberman concludes his latest opus featuring the fiery-haired heroine in another chapter of her early adventures. He's joined by fan-favorite Sonja artist Walter Geovani (Death-Defying 'Devil, Clean Room) whose prolific work on the character goes back over a decade, most celebrated being his run with Gail Simone!
